description: List OpenAI realtime sessions with filtering and pagination.

flags.name: --client-feature
flags.validation: Valid values: giant_anchor_prediction_creation, giant_anchor_prediction_comment, expert_broadcast_message_creation, expert_job_production_plan_dispatch_instruction_creation, development, super_power_post_creation, slack_realtime_chat.

flags.description: Filter by minimum secret expiration time (ISO 8601)
flags.name: --client-secret-expires-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.description: Filter by maximum secret expiration time (ISO 8601)
flags.name: --client-secret-expires-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.description: Filter by whether secret expiration is set (true/false)
flags.name: --is-client-secret-expires-at
--created-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --created-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --updated-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time.

flags.name: --updated-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time.

validation_notes: Date-time filters require valid ISO 8601 timestamps and cannot be empty. Boolean filters must be strict true or false. client-feature values must be one of the allowed enum names.
